RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: I work in the Thermal Vacuum Area of the Integration and Testing Laboratory of the National Institute for Space Research, since 1998, and currently I have participated of the preparation, installation and monitoring of the thermal-vacuum tests of systems, subsystems and equipment of CBERS3&4 performed at LIT, such as: Assembly and integration of the CBERS3&4 Thermal Model, Jan. to Sept. 2009. Thermal Balance Test of the CBERS3&4 Thermal Model, performed at LIT in 2009. Qualification and Acceptance Thermal Vacuum and Temperature Cycling Test of Equipment of following Subsystem: o Electrical Power Supply Subsystem (EPSS); o TTC S Band Subsystem (TTCS); o On Board Data Handling Subsystem (OBDH); o MUX & WFI Transmitter SS (MWT); o Data Collection Subsystem (DCS); o Digital Data Recorder Subsystem (DDR). I have participated of the assembly, preparation, installation and monitoring of the qualification and acceptance thermal vacuum test of all satellites programs, performed at LIT since 1998, such as: Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Thermal and Flight Model of the scientific satellites 1, SACI 1&2, 1997/1999 Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Thermal and Flight Model of the Argentinean Earth Observation and Space Science Satellite, SAC-C, 1998/1999 Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Flight Model of the Humidity Sounder for Brazil, HSB, 1999 Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Flight Model of China-Brazil Earth Resource Satellite, CBERS 2, 2001 Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Flight Model of the technological satellite, SATEC, 2003 Thermal Balance and Thermal Cycling Test in Flight Model of the Aquarius/SAC-D, 2010 SPECIALTY: Preparation, installation and monitoring of thermal vacuum and climatic tests of systems, subsystems and equipment of satellites. Assembly, installation and manufacture of thermal control devices, such as: MLI, electric cables, skin-heaters, halogen lamps, cal rod, infrared arrays, flow meters and radiometers. Installation of temperature sensors: thermocouples, thermistors and RTD. Leak Test.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Has experience in Aerospace Engineering, focusing on Satellites and Other Aerospace Devices

ENDERECO-PROFISSIONAL.NOME-ORGAO: Laboratrio de Integrao e Testes - LIT

ENSINO-MEDIO-SEGUNDO-GRAU.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Escola Estadual de 2} Grau D. Aracy Leite Pereira Lopes
